categories: Category:Imperial I-class Star Destroyers of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Executrix was the first Imperator-class Star Destroyer, launched late during the Clone Wars.
As the first of its make, the Executrix was one of a handful of Imperator-class ships scheduled to do live-fire exercises during the Clone Wars before full production of the class was to begin.
Commanded by Moff Wilhuff Tarkin and Captain Darcc, Executrix later led an assault on Kashyyyk approximately two months after the conclusion of the Wars.
In chapter 37 of Dark Lord: The Rise of Darth Vader, the Executrix is erroneously referred to as the Executor.
